title: Wave-particle duality - electron and light freq

content.question: An electron of mass <math alttext="m sub e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub></mstyle></math> is traveling at a speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>. What is the frequency of light that has the same wavelength as the de Broglie wavelength of the electron?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator h and denominator m sub e, end sub, v sub 0, end sub, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mrow><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator m sub e, end sub, v sub 0, end sub, c, and denominator h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>c</mi></mrow><mi>h</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator m sub e, end sub, v, sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mi>h</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator h, and denominator m sub e, end sub, v sub 0, end sub, c" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mrow><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>c</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator m sub e, end sub, v sub 0, end sub, c, and denominator h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>e</mi></msub><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>c</mi></mrow><mi>h</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
